content: Instruction: Below is a conversation between the doctor and patient. Each conversational turn in the dialogue is marked with an index. Summarize the conversation to generate a clinical note with four sections: HISTORY OF PRESENT ILLNESS, PHYSICAL EXAM, RESULTS, ASSESSMENT AND PLAN. For each sentence in the clinical note, cite one or more conversational turns that support this sentence. When citing several conversational turns, use [1][2][3]. Cite at least one conversational turn and at most ten conversational turns in each sentence. If multiple conversational turns support the sentence, cite them all.
